website_summaries.verdict: Sophisticated, full-grip yoga socks of quality, breathable material.
pros: Socks have an inspirational “happy” reminder on the topside
So well liked that consumers buy multiple pairs
Unisex: fits women’s sizes 6-9 or men’s 4-8
Non-skid dots last after multiple washes or daily yoga use
Also popular for the elderly and new moms
cons: Tight fit because they don’t over stretch, so we recommend not putting them in your dryer

customer_reviews.title: Great for hospital
customer_reviews.text: As I was preparing for my second c-section I remembered how cold my feet were at the hospital and how I was required to wear the thin hospital socks with grips when first up and around walking. I wanted to make sure I could wear my own warm socks this time. These were perfect! They are a nice thick althletic style sock with plenty of grip. They fit pretty snug, but not uncomfortable even with slightly swollen Pregnant feet 😊
customer_reviews.author: Renee T.

customer_reviews.title: As good as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my elderly mom who likes to walk about her home in socks only but has slipped a few times and fallen. Now these non-skid socks are just the thing for her. Easy to put on and she can go from carpet to kitchen tile floor or bathroom with confidence. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: RLJComm

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with these!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for the hospital when I gave birth. I loved having them! The nurses kept telling me they would provide some for free, but trust me that the hospital ones are nothing to write home about. The free ones are loose and scratchy. I was happy I spent the money on these and brought all three pairs with me so I could have a fresh set each day. They fit really well, don't move around at all on my foot, the non-slip part gives great traction which is a must for stability if you've had a c-section.
customer_reviews.author: TishTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, great traction, I can't take them off!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! My apartment gets cold at night and I'm always wearing socks, but when I'm running around cleaning or cooking, I start slipping on the hardwoods, so I needed something comfy and warm with a bit of traction. These definitely fit the bill! They're super comfortable and cushioned, and the sticky pads at the bottom aren't so huge that you feel them on the bottom of your feet. I wear them almost every night when I'm lounging or cleaning (the only nights I don't are when they're in the wash). I don't actually use them for their intended Barre/Yoga/Pilates purpose, but I'd recommend them to anyone for anything that they need comfort & traction!
customer_reviews.author: Devon Walter

customer_reviews.title: The Best for Winter Wear
customer_reviews.text: What makes these non-slip socks different from other brands? The small dot grips are tightly applied to the outside of the sock rather than being stitched into the interior of the sock that your foot steps into. This is the only sock I have found that does not transmit cold into the interior of the sock via the grips. In cold weather, especially if you wear socks to warm your feet in bed on cold nights, these socks keep your feet warm. The only non-slip socks to wear in winter.
customer_reviews.author: roseystoney

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have smaller feet
customer_reviews.text: I love these, I don't love how tight they are on my toes however. Aside from that they are comfortable, thick and would keep my feet warm. I wear a size 10 shoe, these say up to a size 10 in women's, however I would say maybe 9 at the most. I am just super picky when it comes to thing on my feet. But I ordered these for a hospital visit, and figured I could use them for PT as well. But I've bought ones that are larger.
customer_reviews.author: Cupidsmyth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect socks for many reasons
customer_reviews.text: I have six pairs of these socks. I have black and gray. I use them for yoga and exercise. They are comfy on your feet and enable you to feel more secure on your feet. The grips help with your ability to safely walk without falling. I have spinal stenosis and these socks provide more support to my feet. I would highly recommend these for maternity wear. I love them and they are good for my feet. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & comfort - well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I was instantly in love. I always have socks on as I cannot stand my feet to feel dirty. You will never catch me barefooted. Friends & family would collect hospital socks for bc of the grippers. I have had other gripper socks as well but none that are this good of quality. The socks theirself are thick yet breathable. So you can still wear them in the summer. They feel so soft against your skin & the quality of the grippers cannot be beat. For anyone who loves gripper socks these are well worth the buy! I am headed to buy more now. I already know three pairs are not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks! I wear them every day, winter and summer on my hardwood floors. I also wear them on the gym's cement swimming pool apron and vinyl dressing room floors. The cleaning solution they used make them skating slick with wet feet. I'm a partially disabled 70+ year old woman and can't afford slips. With these socks, I NEVER slip. After 3 years of daily wear, I wouldn't even have to replace them except that my dog ate a few. She liked them too! I HIGHLY recommend these socks.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen P.

customer_reviews.title: Replacement hospital socks!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for when I was in the hospital for my son's birth. I hate wearing the hospital socks! Hospital socks are so uncomfortable, scratchy, and just don't fit at all. These socks were exactly what I was looking for in a hospital sock replacement. They felt like regular socks that arw comfy and stable. The only thing I wish was that I ordered more since I was in the hospital for about a week. All the nurses and doctors loved them and thought they were such a great idea cause they didn't like hospital socks either. The hospital staff also liked that they had a little motivational saying on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Nola

customer_reviews.title: Quality Not Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: Loved these socks at first but three months later so disappointed. When I first received the socks, I thought what great quality . . . Then return policy closed, and two months afterward I noticed both socks having holes in the bottom. I had never placed these socks in the dryer either. I was just about to order several more pairs when I noticed the holes. I had purchased these for yoga and for preventing falls on bare floors. So disappointed and very glad I waited to give my review. Initially it would have been a five star.
customer_reviews.author: DJN

customer_reviews.title: Love. These. Socks.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Husband and I have all-wood flooring throughout the house and tile in the kitchen, laundry room and bathrooms, so these are a must have especially when we’re carrying our three week old daughter around the house. I’m not a person who likes to wear socks around the house, but I make an exception for these. I can wear them all day long! I didn’t wear these at the hospital. I chose to wear the hospital issued socks because hospitals are germy and I didn’t want to wear my stuff there and then wear at home. I plan to buy another set!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Mickens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Socks/Slippers
customer_reviews.text: They are great for walking socks. They are great for around the house socks. They are non-slip great socks. They are as good as any light slipper out there and they fit perfectly. Once you pull them on, they are forgotten. No need to adjust them. It took six decades to find these socks. I'm not a sock person. I always go for comfort and durability when buying socks. I'd rather be barefoot (SW desert dweller). I bet they are wonderful for yoga too! Wish there were more colors. I have all three colors. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Corkidecat

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about 3 washes.
customer_reviews.text: All got holes at the heel. Regular socks last longer than these....but are half the price or less. Would not buy again or recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tinu

customer_reviews.title: Smelly, Tight, Fabric Doesn't Breathe
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 5 so ordered small. But these ran smaller than indicated. There is a noticeable chemical odor. The material is like that of compression socks. I only tried on my hand and did not like the feel. The sock wasn't soft like other socks I own. The fabric doesn't breathe. If you want short compression socks, then you might give these a try. I will be returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: Min Pin MomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these. Great for walking around on hard wood floors or tile just everyday in the house. I do not like to go bare foot these are great to just wear all day in the house, I have work in shoes and they are comfy that way too. You can not feel the grips when you are wearing shoes (or I can't anyway) and they serve the yoga sock function perfectly. No sliding out of position.
customer_reviews.author: Christina H.

customer_reviews.title: Wore out quite quickly, I'll stick with the fiterati ...
customer_reviews.text: Wore out quite quickly, I'll stick with the fiterati brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: They fit and they're so comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with these socks. I wanted something that would be soft on my feet and keep me from slipping when walking around the house on my new vinyl floors. My Isotoner leather-type soles make too much noise on the floors but these are nice and quiet. They are thick enough that I don't feel the cold floor but not so thick that they'll be hot in the summer. I like the quality of the gripper material on the bottom of the socks and that it covers the whole bottom. I'll be ordering more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Thick and nice.
customer_reviews.text: I use yoga socks for slippers, and I have ordered several brands. These are the best. They are a bit thicker and are nicer around the ankles. They also have the non skid across the whole bottom instead of just the ball of foot and heal.
customer_reviews.author: Carols

customer_reviews.title: Better then slippers
customer_reviews.text: As an older person, I love to wear these around the house. The bottoms of these are great for not sliding, and keep you with good balance. I used to wear socks around the house and found I slipped to many times with them. So when my daughter in law came for a visit and I saw them, I ordered a few pair. Have been extremely happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P.

customer_reviews.title: Be Amazing grip socks.
customer_reviews.text: These grip socks are great. My first pair and love the black color. I wear them in Pure Barre and like that the grips go to the toes. Comfortable on your feet. Words on the socks are inspiring.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Warm non-slip socks
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks! I wear them around my apartment (wood floors) to keep my feet warm. I love the non-slip feature. Sometimes I’ll nearly skip if I take a corner too quickly in regular socks, and these keep me from doing that. They’re nice and thick too and they keep my feet nice and toasty during winter. I’ve recommended them to my mom and sister and I’d definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Cristen M

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks for Yoga and wearing around the house. With tile floors, the grips on the bottom are awesome! It is impossible to find anything like this in stores. Price wise, I like the choice to buy (1) or a (2) pack or a (3) pack. I have worn these for several weeks in hotels & at home and I am placing another order for another color. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I wear women's size 9-9 1/2 and these fit perfectly. I wear them most days around the house, and they last a long time. I'm buying my second set after having them for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Astone

customer_reviews.title: Can wear with shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks:) they are very nice quality with just the right size non-slip soles. We don’t wear shoes in our house so I can wear these without slipping or leaving footprints on our floors. The best part? I can slip on my shoes...usually Birkenstocks when I nead to go outside!
customer_reviews.author: K. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend these. Very nice quality and like the non-skid feature
customer_reviews.author: Merilyn

customer_reviews.title: Good Traction and Comfort and Got Mom's Approval
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these for my 90+ years mother for comfort and traction around the house. She thought they were pretty but looked "funny." Oh, well. Got a call the next week that these sock are very comfortable and she really likes the feeling on the kitchen and the hall floors. She feels much more secure walking and they keep her feet warm. SUCCESS! Thank you. I will be ordering more, just need to find them in purple. Note: that "little pully thing at the back was a good idea." Again, SUCCESS.
customer_reviews.author: Teekae

customer_reviews.title: Nice Socks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these socks to use either in the hospital or at home afterwards. I love these socks. They are comfy, they do not slid off, and they gripes to prevent falling. I like that they said happy and be amazing on the socks. They hospital did not let me use the socks during surgery but I did afterwards in my room cause I unexpectedly had to stay 2 nights. I wear them at home too. The socks arrived pretty fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Sherree T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for hospital stays!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to wear at the hospital during labor and delivery and they were perfect. The grips are excellent, they didn't keep my feet overly warm, and they fit well when I tried them on before swelling, and were STILL comfortable and not to tight when my feet swelled up to over twice their original size. Also, the nurses kept complimenting them and the message on the bottom was really encouraging when I was having difficult times with my long stay. An absolute improvement over the hospital provided socks.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great grippers for my 91 yr old mom!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these socks for my elderly mother to wear in our Florida home because we have only tile and wooden flooring. She loves them and I love the fact they keep her feet firm on the floor! They keep her feet nice and warm in the air conditioned house!
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Non Slip Socks
customer_reviews.text: Loved these socks. I needed them for walking on my hardwood floors (I have a balance issue), and these were amazing. Dots covered the whole surface of the bottom of my foot, and didn't "recede" into the sock, after wearing them all day. I will gladly get 10 more pairs!
customer_reviews.author: dis0201

customer_reviews.title: Great for Purebarre
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great for the purpose I got them which is to use them during Purebarre class. They are durable so far. Soft great material. Fits my 7.5 US shoe size feet just fine, and stays on during class (important ;)). They are not terribly cheap but neither are any barre socks, but they do the job and I'm glad I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Farnoosh Brock

customer_reviews.title: Great for about the house as well as stretching
customer_reviews.text: These are so good! I tend to slip and like to keep something on my feet. Not bulky like a slipper. It's like walking barefoot about the house. And great for stretching. Keeps a good grip. I now have 2 pair and plan on getting more.
customer_reviews.author: KATZMAMA

customer_reviews.title: Gift for a Friend
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a pair for my best friend who is due next month & while I haven’t tried them on of course, they feel very super soft & durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ndea

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect and I like the low cut design versus a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mother-in-law who is recovering from a broken leg and must have non-skid socks to wear as she tries to rehabilitate at home. They are perfect and I like the low cut design versus a crew style that will cause swelling. I am very pleased and she loves them! Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: kokadots

customer_reviews.title: These Are Great!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had hip surgery and needed some non slip socks for around the house. These socks are super comfy and I have no issue of them "rolling" off from my heels when struggling to get in and out of my chair. The word Happy is on the top of each foot, so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B

customer_reviews.title: Love! Recommend for all Yogis!
customer_reviews.text: These are thick enough to be quite comfortable and keep feet warm. They do slip off if I accidentally drag a foot doing Down dog or a similar pose.... keeps me your conscious. Works well on my mat, on the carpet and on the tile.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use at the hospital for the birth of my daughter. I absolutely loved them! The color is vibrant and happy, the sayingnon the top & bottom of the sock is very encouraging, and the non-slip bottom worked just as I hoped it would! I found them to be perfect for my needs and would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: ariarey

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for hospital stay!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a hospital stay- way better than what they give you at the hospital. The socks are a thick fabric which is great for the cold floor and the non stick bottom was very effective!
customer_reviews.author: -A

customer_reviews.title: Best Traction Socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks are awesome! I wore them in the hospital this week while giving birth to my son and they kept me very comfortable and warm. The grip the socks provide Is excellent. I would recommend these socks to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Chunn

customer_reviews.title: Okay- but real pure barre socks would be more grippy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear to pure barre classes. They worked okay, but I might have preferred to splurge on a pair I really liked of the pure barre brand. I think their grips are bigger so they work better than these, even though the price is good. I took about 10 pure barre classes and they worked okay for me, but I’m not sure how they’d hold up long term after multiple washes.
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, a tad big
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, however I have a size 8.5 women’s shoe and felt like these fit a little loose even after washing. I used these to wear I side a pair of high heels booties that my foot kept sliding in and these did the trip! Just wish they were more snug
customer_reviews.author: April Cook

customer_reviews.title: The socks run small
customer_reviews.text: I have a small foot, wearing size 7 shoe. I ordered the socks in size 5 to 11 and my toes are at the very end of the sock and they hurt the end of my toes. Other than that they have a very good non skid sole of which I am pleased. I can wear them for awhile then I have to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: While thick and had great grip the quality is terrible. The seams/ stitching is weak especially at the toe. Wore one pair once just around the house and the tow area worn through and suddenly there was a hole! Thankful for Amazon’s great return policy.
customer_reviews.author: 24carrots

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I wore these while deliverying our daughter a week ago. It’s funny how something so small can making you feel a little more comfortable. Got several compliments on how adorable they were. I was worried that the grippers would hurt my feet because some of these slipper socks are awful, that was not the case here you can hardly tell they are there.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Derrickson

customer_reviews.title: They cuddle my feet!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected! They looked too large in packaging but fit perfectly..I wear a size 8.5 to 9 shoe. They have good grip for yoga on either hardwood or on my mat. I love that say “Happy” on top of each one. That is just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: WA painter

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pilates!
customer_reviews.text: I use these socks for Pilates and they work much better than the Target ones i bought in store. I am a size 7 and they fit well and don't skid barely at all! I love the color set too. I wish they were a little cheaper, but since I do Pilates 3-4 times a week and constantly wash my socks, I needed at least 6 pairs!
customer_reviews.author: buyer123

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are wonderful. The traction they provide is really nice on my hardwood floors. Highly recommend these socks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for barre, but used to be better?
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my barre classes but they aren’t as nice as a pair I bought from the same brand several months ago. I bought one pair in black first and it was super thick and tightly woven. Then I recently bought a pack of three and they are still nice, but not as thick or tight. I still recommend them for barre as a warmer, more supportive option than most other varieties.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, these do not have much grip to them. They are comfy, but the dots on the bottom are smooth instead of sticky, so I don't find that they really grip well.
customer_reviews.author: Dreams008

customer_reviews.title: Runs small & shrinks when washed
customer_reviews.text: The socks are very cute but they run small and shrink a lot after washing. I have average size feet, size 9 in women’s shoes but these would probably only be comfortable for someone with really small feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Soft, comfortable, good quality, strong grippers, the back ankle portion comes up a little higher which I thought I wasn’t going to like bit since it’s a little looser in that area it’s actually very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before purchasing. Toeless socks tend to bother me so I chose these. I'm really happy with this purchase. They are nice and thick but they breathe. Good reaction. ... and the fact that they say "HAPPY" makes me smile when I look down at my feet during class. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Ginger benckert

customer_reviews.title: They are nonslip
customer_reviews.text: Worked well to steady a person’s feet who had preciously slipped several times. She reports, “they do the trick.” She wears a women’s size 9 shoe, they fit well. Note, they are below ankle.
customer_reviews.author: D Darkman

customer_reviews.title: Not for Barre class on carpet.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these socks after reading the reviews. I purchased them to use in Barre class, which is done on carpet. They don't provide any traction! I was slipping backwards trying to do plank and push-ups. If you're looking for a grippy sock to use on hard surface floors, they make work better for those applications but they don't provide the needed traction on carpeted floors.
customer_reviews.author: MeBu

customer_reviews.title: Great for after delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great for after delivery of my baby, they helped keep my feet warm and kept me from falling.
customer_reviews.author: Rusti Benoit

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are warm and cozy and the non slip soles keep me safe on the bare floors. I recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: LMG618

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for barre classes!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these socks for barre class. They are vastly more affordable than the Pure Barre brand for equal quality. I've stocked up!
customer_reviews.author: Norma Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Socks for Laboring-Message Was Playful and Encouraging!
customer_reviews.text: I had an unmediated birth about 3 Months ago, and I was all about positive messages and mantras. These socks provided that for me during that time! The nurse even said, "Read you're socks! You are amazing and you can do this!" LOL beyond labor and delivery, they are awesome socks that are comfortable and can be worn for many different activities. Love having them as a reminder of the day I birthed my son each and every time I wear them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This non-slip sock is "just right"!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect socks for my elderly mother to help her navigate hardwood floors. She's 84 and said the pink color was "spiffy"! The sock is of just the right heaviness - not too thin, nor overly thick. I like the fact that there is a little collar around the ankle, which keeps the sock from creeping into her shoe if she puts her shoes on over it.
customer_reviews.author: WayneW

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure whether I like them or not
customer_reviews.text: There are thicker than any other of the pilates socks I have, I'm not sure whether I like them or not. They are comfy, but I think maybe the thickness prevents the 'feel' for balance.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these socks!!! Great for Pilates and barre! Cheaper and way better quality than my bar method socks.
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and soft!
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine to use for my labor and delivery. I wasn’t very fond of the hospital socks so I wanted something more comfortable. These were soft and fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Turi

customer_reviews.title: Nice, bright and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift so I didn't actually use the items myself but they look well made and sturdy. The colors are a little more intense than they look in the photo but in a good way.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Great for hospital!
customer_reviews.text: These were so perfect in the hospital when I gave birth to my daughter! Kept my feet warm and clean and I felt better knowing the grips were there so I didn’t slip on the floor when I was moving slowly after birth.
customer_reviews.author: Bre S.

customer_reviews.title: Look no further...
customer_reviews.text: I love these Yoga socks. I wear them around the house all day to avoid slipping on my wooden floors. They are comfortable and seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Bretag

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy, and fit well
customer_reviews.text: Size 10 feet, these fit perfectly. Not sure why anyone on here says they fit tight. Honestly, if these were loose I don't see how you could use them for Pure Barre, Pilates etc., you'd be sliding all over the place! Haven't washed them yet, simply tried them on to verify fit. I assume the other reviews regarding washing will hold true.
customer_reviews.author: Bren C

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks, especially for hospital visit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my stay in the hospital. They were very comfortable, cute (got compliments from a few nurses), stayed on my feet my whole stay, kept my feet warm, and kept me safe from slipping and possible germs (had I been bare foot). I wore them the whole time!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Barton

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend These...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 77 year old wife, to help prevent falls in the house on our laminate flooring. So far, they're proving to be a smart investment. She loves the added warmth, and the additional traction she has when walking.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Bill

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I have several pair of these. My floors are so slippery I need socks like these to wear and these are perfect. They are a great quality and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality good fit
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my mother- she said they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, and they wash well (I washed them inside out, in a laundry mesh bag, and air dry) you will NOT slip in these. I also use them for my rebounder.
customer_reviews.author: Gone with the Kale

customer_reviews.title: Non-skid socks
customer_reviews.text: Love these non-skid socks. Since my back surgery I have had pain in my back that also radiates down my legs and have a hard time walking, so these socks help walking throughout the house which has a lot of hardwood that I am always afraid i’d slip, but these help me from slipping and breaking something in my body. I have also given them to a sister who has fallen and broken quite a few bones. It awful to get old!!! But, these precautions help a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Mylee

customer_reviews.title: Great socks!
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks! Perfect for Yoga and Pilates classes. Good fabric, super comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy with grip
customer_reviews.text: I love these sock to wear around the house to stay warm and not slip on the wood floors...I have also used these for yoga a couple time. great socks!
customer_reviews.author: WittyKitty

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I really love these socks! They aren’t tight at the ankle. They stay in place and do keep you from slipping and sliding. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S. Pettys

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Hospital Socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks were great for the hospital. They were super comfortable. My only complaint is that they left black fuzz everywhere. Then when I took them off, my feet were covered in very thick black fuzz. Other than the fuzz, these socks were great. They are a thick sock, so if you don’t like your feet hot or have problem with sweaty feet, you may not like these socks.
customer_reviews.author: R. Holler

customer_reviews.title: Good gift. (Labor)
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these. I got them for our time in the hospital for the birth of our second child. They are comfortable and hold up well, much nicer than hospital socks!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: The best socks ever!
customer_reviews.text: I used these socks for my hospital stay after giving birth & I wish I ordered more! They’re cozy, not too thick, & not too thin. The rubber bottoms were perfect for grip. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela C

customer_reviews.title: Feeling safe
customer_reviews.text: Being home now I don’t wear shoes.....so these socks are perfect. Non slip on my wooden floors
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Varcasia

customer_reviews.title: ... fits all assumption did not work quality was otherwise excellent
customer_reviews.text: intended as anti slip use by 91 yr old mother-in-law where description about fit was inconclusive and thus one size fits all assumption did not work quality was otherwise excellent
customer_reviews.author: Honest Assessment

customer_reviews.title: My favorite socks. I wear as indoor slippers
customer_reviews.text: My favorite socks. I wear as indoor slippers, on my hardwood floors. Love the snug and secure fit. While pricey per pair, they last a long time. This is my second purchase of this sock. Will buy again. Loved during maternity and post partum
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These socks are so comfortable. they don't fall off my heel like some others. I don't yoga,but am as active as much as i can be with my handicap. i wear these in the house and they keep my feet warm. My daughter took a pair of them so I will order more. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these grippies
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfy. Don't plan on trying to slip anywhere, because it'll never happen. Glad I bought these for hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: With hardwood floors and not wearing shoes in the house, these are perfect for non slip, warm & comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Mcclellan

customer_reviews.title: I love these!!! Buy them over the cheaper versions.
customer_reviews.text: these are my absolute favorite-they are very good quality , they are thick (so wont fall apart with a few washes) and the grips on the bottom are amazing-I would spend money on these over the cheaper versions- this is the second set I purchased
customer_reviews.author: Meet Me in Montauk

customer_reviews.title: Favorite grippy socks
customer_reviews.text: Favorite grippy socks ever. I like the little happy words on them and the grips work great on them for my slippy cold wooden stairs inside during winter. I also like that they have some extra fabric at the ankle so that your gym shoes won't rub your ankle raw.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable! High quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable. I wear a size 6 and they fit perfect! I take with me on plane for traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Chanel

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is really small
customer_reviews.text: These socks are sized very small. I could barely get them on my feet so after a few tries i didnt even bother anymore
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Good none slip just too tight.
customer_reviews.text: These socks are really good. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars: they are really tight. I bought them for my elderly mom so she wouldn’t slip on our hardwood floors, but the band around the ankle is sooooo tight. She only wears a size 8 shoe, but her feet/ankles swell sometimes. I had to cut the collar of these because they were too tight on her.
customer_reviews.author: The Bibliophile

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy grip socks.
customer_reviews.text: Comfy grip socks! Comfortable and stylish. Recouping from surgery, I wear these everyday at hospital.
customer_reviews.author: eluena

customer_reviews.title: More secure on tile floor
customer_reviews.text: I do not like wearing shoes in the house. At the same time, I have a slight fear of falling. I wear these socks everyday in the house, and have felt more secure and comfortable, especially walking on tiled floors. And it helps keep my feet warmer.
customer_reviews.author: em

customer_reviews.title: Great for hospital
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear in the hospital during labor, delivery, and recovery. They were perfect for that purpose! When first delivered, they looked large, but after washing them, they shrunk a bit and fit perfectly. (I wear a size 5 shoe, for reference.)
customer_reviews.author: ACS

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Socks were a little big but I prefered them that way because my feet tend to swell at random with my pregnancy and I wanted something that would be comfy during those times.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonR92

customer_reviews.title: Too big for size 7.5
customer_reviews.text: The material is nice & they are as pictured, but too long. I wear a 7-7.5 shoe & these came off my feet during barre class. Unfortunately I bought 2 pair. 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Southern Patti

customer_reviews.title: A great value for simple around-the-home socks
customer_reviews.text: This brand is one I stumbled across years ago and now give as gifts for expecting mothers. The rubber nubs are well placed to provide stability on non-carpeted floors. Rubber nubs stay on through multiple wearings and washing. A great value for simple around-the-home socks.
customer_reviews.author: Hvistym

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable socks! I would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love the socks! I bought them for when I went into labor so I didn’t have to use the hospital socks and they were perfect. I still wear them around my house because I have hardwood floors and the grips work really well.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Wilkey

customer_reviews.title: Sizing off
customer_reviews.text: The description is misleading as far ass size. I wear a size 9.5-10 size shoe- reg width. These are too tight to wear and be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: My push socks
customer_reviews.text: These were my splurge hospital bag item. Wanted to wear them while I was in labor. Which i did. Definitely didnt look at my socks the whole time and my feet were more swollen then i anticipated when i bought them, but they fit. Im sure they gave some nurses a kick!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great socks for hospital stay!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and I don’t slip on wood floor. I bought them for upcoming back surgery and 5 day hospital stay. You have to walk right away and I wanted a good fit and feel secure on hospital floors. These are perfect and fit the same after laundered!
customer_reviews.author: Kaye James

product_meta.title: Non-Slip Socks Yoga Barre Pilates Hospital Maternity Sock w/Grips For Women Men
feature_bullets: SOFT - Towel-like cushioned sole combines with high thread knitting technology and premium high quality cotton, offers max comfort for barre, yoga, pilates, dance, barefoot workout, piyo, ballet, bikram etc. Extra thick heel tab prevents rubbing & blistering - a must for barre practices!

STURDY - Elastic arch ensures socks stay stable on your feet without shifting around. The socks are widely used for fall prevention by pregnant women, moms with young kids, aging elderly seniors. Pack them for hospital after labor & delivery, c-section or knee surgery or post operation recovery

SECURE - Silicon sticky dots cover from heel to toe. We researched more than 20 techniques to find one way making them stay secure and slip proof after hundreds of washes (We literally test washed it hundreds times!) They make sure your socks do not slide on carpet, hardwood, tile or other flooring.

TRUE no risk buying - if there is anything you don’t like about these socks, even just the color doesn't match your barre studio etc, no matter how small or how insignificant it may sound like, we will get it handled! No questions asked, no expiration date, just pure awesomeness.
Contains 2 pairs of Socks, Black & Pink Color. One Size Fits Most (women 5-10 or men 4-8)
